meanings.definition: Insufficient activity or lack of normal functioning.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed her with underactivity after noticing her low energy levels.
meanings.sent2: The underactivity in the classroom was evident as the students sat quietly at their desks.
meanings.sent3: The underactivity of the sleepy cat made it the perfect nap buddy.
meanings.sent4: The underactivity of the old computer was like a slow-moving turtle in a fast-paced world.
meanings.sent5: The underactivity of the pond created a serene and peaceful atmosphere.

meanings.definition: A state of being less active than usual.
meanings.sent1: The underactivity of the playground was unusual on a sunny day.
meanings.sent2: After the surgery, he experienced underactivity and had to rest more than usual.
meanings.sent3: The underactivity of the lazy sloth was both amusing and adorable.
meanings.sent4: Her underactivity in social events was like a shadow following her everywhere.
meanings.sent5: The underactivity of the clock made time seem to stand still.
